title: SHOP YOUR STYLE IN HELL'S KITCHEN
short_desc: Hell's Kitchen is becoming one of the city's trendiest shopping districts. Get a $50 gift card to shop for a new style.
long_desc:
You may not have noticed, but Hell's Kitchen is quietly becoming a hip shopping destination. During your next stay at the WJ, we'll present you with a $50 American Express gift card to explore the new stores nearby. Find your next piece of jaw-dropping jewelry or eye-catching attire. Your stay will also include complimentary Wi-Fi, so you can research your ideal purchase before heading out. Come see why Hell's Kitchen is now the premier neighborhood in New York—with delectable dining, timeless theater, and sophisticated shopping.

Package Details:

  • $50.00 AMEX gift card (One time, one per reservation)
  • Complimentary in-room Wi-Fi

Terms and Conditions:

  • Reservations of two consecutive nights or longer required
  • Offer is not valid for groups of 5 or more
  • Offer cannot be combined with any other promotions, special rates, or packages 
  • Rates are per room, per night, and based on availability at the time of reservation. Room and occupancy taxes are not included.
